title: Creative Problem-Solving (CPS) Course: Mobile-Based Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Mathematical problem-solving competency enhancement program for professionals, applying mobile-optimized CPS (Creative Problem Solving) methodology

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex math problems within six months using the four-stage CPS (Creative Problem Solving) model: problem discovery, idea generation, solution development, and acceptance review.
In blended learning environments, learners can apply creative thinking tools with over 80% accuracy through weekly mobile microlearning modules (three times per week).
Through team-based project evaluation, learners can mathematically model real workplace problems and propose actionable solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
